name: Nathan Zipster Lite - Unisex
categories: Shoulder bags, slings and waist packs
description: Going for a run with your ID, phone and gels is easier with the Zipster Lite. The Lite version has the same features as the original Nathan Zipster, but in a more lightweight construction. Two zippered pockets and two stretch pockets let you carry the essentials while keeping your hands free.2 zippered pockets (4 pockets total).Super-soft stretch waist belt provides a snug, comfortable fit.Zippered pocket fits up to iPhone 8/8 Plus, Galaxy S8/S8+.Also super useful for travelling and at the gym.
